prompt:
Nurse: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Daniel Jimenez?

Patient: Yes. It is.

Nurse: Thank you for confirming. Could you please provide your date of birth for verification purposes?

Patient: Six seven seventy seven?

Nurse: Thank you for confirming, Mr. Jimenez. I'm calling about your upcoming total knee replacement. Is this a good time to talk?

Patient: Yeah. It's fine.

Nurse: Okay, thank you for your time, Mr. Jimenez. I hope your day is going well so far. Can you share a bit about how you've been feeling today?

Patient: And just what is something wrong?

responses.gpt4: Oh, not at all, Mr. Jimenez. These check-in calls are routine before procedures like yours. We just want to ensure you're feeling okay and answer any questions you might have. Regarding your day, did you manage to do something enjoyable or relaxing?
responses.our_model: I'm sorry if I gave you the wrong impression, Mr. Jimenez. There's nothing wrong. I'm here to help you prepare for your upcoming surgery and answer any questions you might have. How has your day been so far?
